page.title: 20ROAD BUILDING GRAYS
page.content: A new road connecting the London Orbital motorway with Tilbury Docks cuts through farmland to the east of Little Thurrock. Wheat is grown on these slopes and on the drained marshes. This new road has led to many local shops losing business, as a superstore in Tilbury and one at West Thurrock, adjacent to the M25, have claimed a great deal of the local retail business. The parade of shops on Lodge Lane has felt this effect keenly, trade has suffered and some staff have been laid off. The Parade includes a small supermarket,2 grocers,3 hot food take- aways,a dry cleaners,a dog care parlour, an off licence, office supplies, a chemist, 2 newsagents, antiques,fabrics,furniture repairs,2 Building Societies and a popular local public house, The Oak.
